name: Black Diamond Zone Harness - Women's
description: Sleek, super-comfortable, and excellent for sport climbing and alpine missions. With ice screw loops, it can be pulled into service for winter climbing on mixed or ice routes, but it's not so burly you won't want to use it for summer cragging too. The design maximizes comfort and spreads pressure evenly over the waist and legs, so you can take your time to hang and shake out.Constructed with 3D AirMesh and 4-way stretch nylon.Fusion Comfort Technology distribute loads evenly.Seamless Infinity Belay Loop reduces wear points.5 gear loops and 2 ice clipper slots carry all your gear.Women's specific rise.
